name: 荒漠求生
summary:
This is a survival game from third person perspective, in which players search for resources in a desert to build their own base and ward off invaders. 
In this game, the gun accessories can be freely replaced. Destroying enemy can get upgraded to learn new skills. 
The game is constantly updated. I, the only developer, work overtime day and night to update the content, so I have no time to test. If there are any bugs or suggestions, please leave a message. 
Prices will increase while adding content, and if you now purchase the game, it will be permanently updated. 
Obviously, the sooner you buy, the more cost-effective it is.
